page.title: 05Health
page.content: There are a number of medical,dental and optical services in{Montrose.} Three doctors' surgeries deal with a wide range of medical conditions;they also offer pre-natal and ante-natal care.There are also 3 dental practices which are under the National Health Service and 2 opticians. Two hospitals, situated locally,deal with different aspects of health care. {Montrose Royal Infirmary}deals with geriatric and maternity cases.There is also an out-patients unit for casualties and emergencies.{Sunnyside {Royal Hospital}is a psychiatric hospital which is administered by Tayside Health Board. School children between the ages of 5 and 18 are treated by the{School {Health Service.}They do preventative and remedial work on such matters as sight,hearing and dentistry.
